name: Storm Maiden
movement: swim 30 ft., fly 30 ft., walk 30 ft.
description: The Storm Maiden embodies chaotic storms and lightning, possesses a powerful presence, and boasts exceptional physical attributes.
memorable: Intriguingly combines spellcasting with powerful melee attacks and the ability to incapacitate foes.
goals: Mastery of storms and disruption of foes through lightning-based attacks.
relations: Might be encountered alongside other elemental beings or servants of chaotic forces.
environment: Typically found in stormy or tempestuous areas, embodying the essence of chaos and weather.
strengths: Immunity to poison and resistance to lightning and thunder damage, along with strong physical and spellcasting abilities.
weaknesses: Relatively low Constitution and Wisdom could be exploited with the right strategy.
attacks: Can deliver deadly melee strikes with thunder damage and has a powerful ranged lightning attack.
most_powerful_ability: Throw Lightning can incapacitate foes and shift battle dynamics significantly.
senses: Possesses darkvision and a passively perceptive nature.
skills: Has notable skill proficiencies related to its elemental nature and spellcasting.
additional_information: Innate spellcasting ability relies on Charisma.
Can manipulate water levels and create hazardous terrain.
Control over thunderous energy increases melee attack threat.
Can teleport and create waves of thunderous force.
Effective in multiattacks to overwhelm opponents.
spellcasting: Can cast spells like create water, ray of frost, and thunderwave without material components.
test_queries: stormy being with powerful thunder attacks
elemental creature that can fly and swim
storm maiden spellcaster that incapsulates enemies
versatile elemental with lightning and thunder powers
